<p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?city=mansfield" rel="city">Mansfield</a>, OHIO, Oct. 10, <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1869">1869</a>. 
</p><p>
Dear Brother : . . . The panic in <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?city=new york" rel="city">New York</a>, though 
disastrous to a few, will do good. It will prove the absolute necessity of getting upon a specie basis. This process is a hard one and will affect the popularity of Grant's 
administration, but it must be gone through with. . . . 
</p><p>
Affectionately, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=jos" rel="me">John Sherman</a>. 
</p>
